title: Ord irrigation
creator_credit: Western Australian Government Film Unit and T.K. Lloyd
brief_description: A survey of one aspect of Australia’s plans to settle her north. The Ord River Project is based on two dams which irrigate the land for cotton farms. A modern township, Kununurra, has been built.
creator_credit_for_label: Western Australian Government Film Unit and T.K. Lloyd
